topic.title: it isn't weird that *magically* appears an american movie that criticizes a political situation as Joker?
topic.body: It seems a bit ironic for its origin. As if it were a trap.

1566570350_1Dssbq2y2JDD14aojGG9RX3d5EPpw.body: I do not know. I guess that religion is needed in some measure because society needs control. acts like a reminder that tells them that freedom has limits, and i don't know, maybe humanity sometimes needs that limits. just saying ...
